binding:binding.name: Netatmo Binding
binding:binding.description: The Netatmo binding integrates Weather Station with companion modules, Healthy Home Coach, Thermostat Plug and Welcome Camera.

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: Client ID provided for the application you created on http://dev.netatmo.com/createapp

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Client Secret
parameter.description: Client Secret provided for the application you created

parameter.name: webHookUrl
parameter.label: Webhook Address
parameter.description: Protocol, public IP and port to access OH2 server from Internet.

parameter.name: reconnectInterval
parameter.label: Reconnect Interval
parameter.description: The reconnection interval to Netatmo API (in s).

parameter.name: backgroundDiscovery
parameter.label: Background Discovery
parameter.description: If set to true, the device and its associated modules are updated in the discovery inbox at each API call run to refresh device data. Default is false.
